text: Beaver Dams is a hamlet in Schuyler County, New York, United States. The community is located along New York State Route 414, southwest of Watkins Glen. Beaver Dams has a post office with ZIP code 14812, which opened on August 12, 1833, and a Methodist church on Route 19. ==References== Category:Hamlets in Schuyler County, New York
title: Beaver Dams, New York
